Sentencas: The oxidation behaviours and electrical properties of 5 at% Ta doped Ti3SiC2 solid solution have been investigated at 800 degrees C in air for up to 500 h.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The oxidation kinetics of (Ti0.95Ta0.05)(3)SiC2 follows a parabolic law.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The oxidation rate constant is 7.33 x 10(-14) g(2) cm(-4)
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: s(-1), which is lower than those of Ti3SiC2, (Ti0.95Nb0.05)(3)SiC2 and Crofer 22 APU.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Ta doped r-TiO2 formed (Ti0.95Ta0.05)(3)SiC2 during the oxidation process.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Ta doping can limit the outward diffusion of Ti by decreasing the native Ti interstitials concentration and simultaneously restraining the inward diffusion of oxygen by decreasing the O vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: As a result, the oxidation resistance is significantly improved and the oxide scale structure of Ti3SiC2 changes from a double-layer to a monolithic layer.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The ASR of (Ti0.95Ta0.05)(3)SiC2 after oxidation at 800 degrees C in air for 500 h is 29.5 mU cm(2), which is much lower than that of Ti3SiC2.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Ta doping can increase the electron concentration in r-TiO2 and thereby increase the electrical conductivity of r-TiO2.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Therefore, the ASR of (Ti0.95Ta0.05)(3)SiC2 after oxidation is lower compared to that of Ti3SiC2.
Titulo: Investigation on the properties of Ta doped Ti3SiC2 as solid oxide fuel cell interconnects
